casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Dwight PARKER, Sr. No. 306P04-5 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 1, 2018 Mr. Dwight Parker, Sr., For Parker, Dwight, Sr. Ms. Latoya B. Powell, Assistant Attorney General, For State of NC. Mr. Kimberly S. Robb, District Attorney, For State of NC.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 9th of January 2018 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the Superior Court, Pitt County, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court of that County:

"Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 1st of March 2018."

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 9th of January 2018 by Defendant to Proceed In Forma Pauperis:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 1st of March 2018."

Ervin, J. recused
